itemLabel: William Wallace, Baron Wallace of Saltaire

wikipedia_page.main: William John Lawrence Wallace, Baron Wallace of Saltaire, PC (born 12 March 1941 in Leicester), is a British academic, writer and Liberal Democrat politician, and was a Lord in Waiting from 2010 to 2015.

response: * William Wallace, Baron Wallace of Saltaire,  Liberal Democrat politician and Lord in Waiting from 2010 – 2015.
